Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Relates to establishing the Nassau county and Queens county border task force
Summary: Establishes the Nassau county and Queens county border task force to review jurisdiction and boundary disputes.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to establishing the Nassau county and Queens county border task force, and providing for its powers and duties; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
